mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video ( video_title, video_part, video_url, video_view_cnt, video_channel_name, org_img_name, unq_img_name ) VALUES ( #{videoTitle}, #{videoPart}, #{videoUrl}, #{videoViewCnt}, #{videoChannelName}, #{orgImgName}, #{unqImgName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE video SET video_title=#{videoTitle}, video_part = #{videoPart}, video_url=#{videoUrl}, video_view_cnt=#{videoViewCnt}, video_channel_name=#{videoChannelName}, org_img_name = #{orgImgName}, unq_img_name=#{unqImgName} WHERE video_id=#{videoId}
UPDATE video SET video_view_cnt = video_view_cnt + 1 WHERE video_id = #{videoId}
